title: Big Scale Racing
description:
*  1/5 scale Radio Controlled (RC) petrol driven racing cars (length approximately 90 cm)
    * arcade & realistic RC-racing tracks
    * 10 different cars/classes
    * realistic vehicle control and dynamics
    * weather is as unpredictable as in real life: rainy, cloudy and, of course, warm and sunny!
    * frantic 2-player RC action (splitscreen)
    * LAN Multiplay for up to 8 players to challenge your friends
    * 240 smart and individual competitors
    * 12 Teams to join with various car colors, starting numbers, logos and driving styles
    * Training with ghostcar, Quick Race, Cup Championships, and an everlasting Open Championship featuring 240 opponents to beat...
    * zap speed loading: race within seconds after starting the game
    * technical support: up-to-date FAQ, Bulletin Board and email support
    * extra downloadable bonus cars & features on the Internet
